HI THERE!

I'm a passionate back-end developer currently living in Lahti, Finland and studying at LAMK.

I created this blog for the purpose of writing stuff, where I can share what I think about different aspects of life, mostly technologies and movies. This site is built with Jekyll and hosted by Amazon S3. Images are provided by UnSplash.
